column4: I installed ubuntu on a windows box.  Turns out that someone needs some files that were on it before I partitioned and installed ubuntu.  In googling some I see it's possible to recover some files; what do I need for doing that?
I've not used the computer in question at all since the install.
- Grab backtrack 4, boot into live cd mode and look at "fls" and "photorec"
If you use photorec, make sure to save recovered files off to a different HDD. Don't save files onto the same partition you are recovering from.
